title: The Traka 360 Results: Kongstad Soloes to Victory, Two in a Row for Migon
content:
The Dane dropped the hammer with more than 100km to go to win the men's edition, Migon attacks late to make it two in a row in Europe's biggest gravel race.

Read the full article at The Traka 360 Results: Kongstad Soloes to Victory, Two in a Row for Migon on Velo.
author: ahood
